mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(purchaseSerial) totSize FROM purchase WHERE email=#{email}

select r.reviewSerial, p.startDate, p.endDate, p.people, p.purchaseSerial, p.myReview, p.city, case when p.region="1" then '강원도' when p.region="2" then '경기도' when p.region="3" then '경상도' when p.region="4" then '전라도' when p.region="5" then '충청도' end as region from purchase p left join review r on p.purchaseSerial=r.purchaseSerial WHERE p.email=#{email} order by p.myReview asc, p.startDate desc limit #{startNo}, #{listSize}

select t.ticketSerial,t.ticketStartPoint,t.ticketEndPoint,t.ticketDate,t.ticketSeat,t.region, pt.purchaseSerial, case when t.ticketStartTime="오전" then "10:00" when t.ticketStartTime="오후" then "16:00" end as ticketStartTime from ticket t left join purchasedticket pt on t.ticketSerial=pt.ticketSerialStart or t.ticketSerial=pt.ticketSerialEnd where pt.purchaseSerial=#{_parameter};
select myReview from purchase where purchaseSerial=#{_parameter};

select purchaseSerial, city, case when region="1" then '강원도' when region="2" then '경기도' when region="3" then '경상도' when region="4" then '전라도' when region="5" then '충청도' end as region from purchase WHERE purchaseSerial='${_parameter}'
select left(planDate,1) planDate from plan where purchaseSerial=#{_parameter} order by planDate desc limit 1
